query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NULL, [JobTitle] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Employee1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Department] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [BusinessUnit1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DocumentLink1] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [SignedResult] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DateSign] [datetime] NULL)

SELECT Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Name as JobTitle ,Sungero_Core_Recipient.Name as Employee ,dep.Name as Department ,businessUnit.Name as BusinessUnit ,doc.Name as DocumentName ,SignatureType as SignedResult ,SigningDate as SigningDate ,EntityId as DocumentId ,DataSignature as DataSignature FROM Sungero_Core_Sign LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient ON Sungero_Core_Sign.Signatory = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Company_JobTitle ON Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.JobTitle_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient dep ON dep.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Department_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc docNOR ON docNOR.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Parent LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient businessUnit ON businessUnit.Id = dep.Parent;

insert into Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2(ReportSessionId, JobTitle, Employee1, Department, BusinessUnit1, DocumentName, DocumentLink1, SignedResult) values (@ReportSessionId, @JobTitle, @Employee1, @Department, @BusinessUnit1, @BusinessUnit1, @DocumentName, @DocumentLink1, @SignedResult)

select ReportSessionId, JobTitle, Employee1, DateSign, DocumentName, SignedResult, DocumentLink1, Department, BusinessUnit1 from Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2 where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId and DateSign >= @StartDate and DateSign <= @EndDate

SELECT Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Name as JobTitle, Sungero_Core_Recipient.Name as Employee, dep.Name as Department, businessUnit.Name as BusinessUnit, doc.Name as DocumentName, SignatureType as SignedResult, SigningDate as SigningDate, EntityId as DocumentId, DataSignature as DataSignature FROM Sungero_Core_Sign LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient ON Sungero_Core_Sign.Signatory = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Company_JobTitle ON Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.JobTitle_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient dep ON dep.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Department_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc docNOR ON docNOR.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Parent LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient businessUnit ON businessUnit.Id = dep.Parent where Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id in (109, 480);
